body:
Features and Enhancements

Radius Search
  • Two radius search options, True Radius and Zip Radius, are available in Competitive Dashboard, Recruitment, Create a List.
  • Radius Definitions
    • True Radius
      • True Radius results include providers within the radius of the centroid of a single defined zip code, regardless of the zip codes they are in.
    • Zip Radius
      • Zip Radius results include all providers in zip codes whose centroids are within the radius of the centroid of two or more defined zip codes.
    • Zip centroid refers to the geographic center of a zip code.
  • New Columns in Network Counts By Provider Type Export for Zip5 Grouping
    • Network Counts By Provider Type Export includes four new columns: City, Alternative City, Radius, Population.
    • Network counts are the selected zip code (manually entered or population files) + counts for the radius zip codes. The radius zip codes are never displayed in the report.
  • New Columns in Network Counts By Specialty Group Export for Zip5 Grouping
    • Network Counts By Provider Type Export includes four new columns: City, Alternative City, Radius, Population.
    • Network counts are the selected zip code (manually entered or population files) + counts for the radius zip codes. The radius zip codes are never displayed in the report.
  • Top Hospitals Details for Zip5 Grouping
    • Each hospital is displayed in it's own zip code.
